00029 #ifndef myModelElement_h
00030 #define myModelElement_h 1
00031 
00032 //#include "merlin_config.h"
00033 
00034 #include <string>
00035 
00036 using std::string;
00037 
00038 
00039 //      Root class for all elements/components which are used to
00040 //      construct an AcceleratorModel. All myModelElement objects
00041 //      are characterised by a type string and an identifier
00042 //      (name). The type string identifies the type of element
00043 //      (class), while the name is specific to an instance of
00044 //      that element type.
00045 
00046 class myModelElement 
00047 {
00048   public:
00049       //        Constructor taking the name of the element.
00050       explicit myModelElement (const string& aName);
00051 
00052       //        Constructor taking the name of the element.
00053       myModelElement ();
00054 
00055       virtual ~myModelElement ();
00056 
00057       //        Return the name of the element.
00058       virtual const string& GetName () const;
00059 
00060       //        Return the type string for the element.
00061       virtual const string& GetType () const = 0;
00062 
00063       //        Return the qualified name of the component. The
00064       //        qualified name has the form typestr.namestr.
00065       string GetQualifiedName () const;
00066 
00067       //        Virtual constructor.
00068       virtual myModelElement* Copy () const = 0;
00069 
00070       //        Set the name of the component.
00071       void SetName (const string& name);
00072 
00073   protected:
00074 
00075       //        Initialise the myModelElement with the specified name.
00076       void Init (const string& aName);
00077 
00078     // Data Members for Class Attributes
00079 
00080       string id;
00081 
00082   private:
00083   private:  
00084 };
00085 
00086 // Class myModelElement 
00087 
00088 inline myModelElement::myModelElement (const string& aName)
00089   : id(aName)
00090 {}
00091 
00092 inline myModelElement::myModelElement ()
00093 {}
00094 
00095 inline myModelElement::~myModelElement ()
00096 {
00097         // nothing to do
00098 }
00099 
00100 
00101 
00102 inline const string& myModelElement::GetName () const
00103 {
00104         return id;
00105 }
00106 
00107 inline string myModelElement::GetQualifiedName () const
00108 {
00109         return GetType()+'.'+GetName();
00110 }
00111 
00112 inline void myModelElement::SetName (const string& name)
00113 {
00114         id=name;
00115 }
00116 
00117 inline void myModelElement::Init (const string& aName)
00118 {
00119         id=aName;
00120 }

00125 // utility macros:
00126 // GetType() implementation
00127 #define _TYPESTR(s) static const string typestr(#s); return typestr;
